item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 4, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The owner of ip4.me/ip6.me, Kevin Loch, passed away (46 points | 9 comments)
2. Bayleaf · Building a low-profile wireless split keyboard (147 points | 44 comments)
3. Ride into the Future with Waymo on Uber in Austin (36 points | 38 comments)
4. Satellogic's Open Satellite Feed (16 points | discuss)
5. DiffRhythm: Fast End-to-End Full-Length Song Generation with Latent Diffusion (28 points | 16 comments)
6. Show HN: Appstat – Process Monitor for Windows (19 points | 3 comments)
7. Formation of organic glass from a human brain (14 points | 1 comment)
8. Repairable Flatpack Toaster (686 points | 220 comments)
9. Tattoo ink exposure is associated with lymphoma and skin cancers (71 points | 30 comments)
10. Windows NT for GameCube/Wii (152 points | 41 comments)
11. The Meter, Golden Ratio, Pyramids, and Cubits, Oh My (36 points | 13 comments)
12. Lawrence of Arabia, Paul Atreides, and the roots of Frank Herbert's Dune (2021) (213 points | 112 comments)
13. Trellis (YC W24) Is Hiring Eng to Build the Best AI Agents for PDF ( | hide)
14. Enhancing Frame Detection with Retrieval Augmented Generation (15 points | 3 comments)
15. TSMC expected to announce $100B investment in U.S. (333 points | 669 comments)
16. The IBM 650: An appreciation from the field (1986) [pdf] (27 points | 9 comments)
17. DeepSeek's smallpond: Bringing Distributed Computing to DuckDB (132 points | 11 comments)
18. SQLite-on-the-server is misunderstood: Better at hyper-scale than micro-scale (287 points | 136 comments)
19. An Experimental Study of Bitmap Compression vs. Inverted List Compression (12 points | 5 comments)
20. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (March 2025) (345 points | 315 comments)
21. Comparing Fuchsia components and Linux containers [video] (199 points | 152 comments)
22. Hacking the Xbox 360 Hypervisor Part 2: The Bad Update Exploit (238 points | 86 comments)
23. Ask HN: What less-popular systems programming language are you using? (199 points | 271 comments)
24. How Google tracks Android device users before they've even opened an app (63 points | 22 comments)
25. The Golden Age of Japanese Pencils (2022) (326 points | 92 comments)
26. Show HN: Agents.json – OpenAPI Specification for LLMs (168 points | 60 comments)
27. Launch HN: Cuckoo (YC W25) – Real-time AI translator for global teams (71 points | 25 comments)
28. Microsoft's new Dragon Copilot is an AI assistant for healthcare (65 points | 65 comments)
29. DIY "infinity contrast" TV – with 100% recycled parts [video] (8 points | 2 comments)
30. Go-attention: A full attention mechanism and transformer in pure Go (143 points | 63 comments)
